metadata.title: CVE-2014-9274 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
UnRTF allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) andpossibly execute arbitrary code as demonstrated by a file containing thestring "{\cb-999999999".

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9274` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

unrtf - 0.21.5-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unrtf package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.21.5-2').
